title: Cangshu Leyuan
synopsis: To the east of the Happy Forest, there is a mysterious hamster paradise where many cute hamsters live. The protagonist of the story is the sporty and brave "Hapi Dan", the gluttonous and chubby "Lard Dan", and the beauty The kind-hearted "Little Tangdan", the young but fearless "Little Fudan", the director of "Einstein" who often invents and so on. But on the other side of the Happy Forest, there is an Eagle-Wei brand company composed of natural enemies of hamsters, with the boss "Yi Gao" (eagle), "Fox Jingli" (fox), "Shlick" (snake), Yi Gao's secretary "Wuyaya" (crow). (translated from iqiyi)
